TopicTitle: has the kracken attacked anyone today?

Articles.Content:
Today in the spaceplane hangar , for some reason, the weight was NaN [nani?]

following this, I wonder if anything similar has happened to anyone reading this
Not that I know of, but in the mean time, your question has been moved to the Support forum since it seems to be a bug of some sort.

Does the Kracken ever not attack someone at least once a day?

Post/reply 3 of 5!
